DOC.brief_summary: Selective cyclooxygenase ( COX ) -2 inhibitor commonly use analgesic provide similar analgesia reduce adverse effect compare analgesic . However , study conduct postoperative pain tendon-to-bone healing . Here , investigator investigate effect selective COX-2 inhibitor analgesia tendon-to-bone healing follow arthroscopic rotator cuff repair .
DOC.brief_title: A Selective COX-2 Inhibitor Provides Pain Control But Hinders Healing Following Arthroscopic Rotator Cuff Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Participants Selection After obtain institutional review board approval write informed consent participant , investigator prospectively enrol 180 participant schedule undergo arthroscopic acromioplasty rotator cuff repair partial full thickness tear September 2011 August 2012 . A priori statistical power analysis perform calculate number subject require . A difference one point visual analogue scale ( VAS ) define minimal clinically important difference . With power 80 % alpha 0.05 , power analysis demonstrate sample size 51 participant per group need . Assuming dropout rate 20 % , investigator calculate sample size 60 participant per group . Participants randomly assign equal number receive selective COX-2 inhibitor ( celecoxib ; Celebrex® 200 mg bid , Pfizer , Korea ) , traditional NSAIDs ( ibuprofen ; Carol-F® 385 mg tid , Ildong , Korea ) , opioid drug ( tramadol ; Tridol® 50 mg bid , Yuhan , Korea ) 2 week first day surgery . Analgesic medication prescribe preoperatively . Subacromial participant-controlled analgesia ( Automed 3200 , Ace Medical , Seoul , Korea ) use first 48 hour postoperatively participant . Intravenous cefazolin use postoperative antibiotic one day . If participant could tolerate pain regular postoperative medication , oxycodone ( IR codon 5 mg , Unimed , Korea ) administer rescue medication ; maximum dosage limit 20 mg per day accord investigator institution 's standard postoperative pain control procedures 2 week surgery . Clinical Radiological Assessment Participants rat pain satisfaction medication use VAS 0 ( pain/no satisfaction ) 10 ( unbearable pain/extreme satisfaction ) preoperatively 3 day 2 week postoperatively . Administration rescue medication side effect also record . Side effect categorize five category : nausea/vomiting , somnolence/dizziness , gastrointestinal complication ( constipation , diarrhea , abdominal discomfort ) , pruritus , bruising ; respiratory difficulty , renal failure , heart failure , seizure also evaluate . Of 180 participant , 82 follow least 24 month surgery . Shoulder functional score obtain base range motion ( ROM ) data , pain VAS score , Constant-Murley Shoulder score , American Shoulder Elbow Surgeons score , Korean Shoulder Scoring system score . Radiological integrity repair rotator cuff assess use magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) 70 participant ( 25 celecoxib group , 23 ibuprofen group , 22 tramadol group ) ultrasonography remain 12 participant . Postoperative rotator cuff integrity assess use MRI categorize type I V accord classification develop Sugaya et al . follow : type I , sufficient thickness compare normal cuff homogenously low intensity ; type II , sufficient thickness compare normal cuff partial high intensity ; type III , insufficient thickness ( less half thickness normal cuff ) discontinuity , suggest partial-thickness delaminated tear ; type IV , presence minor discontinuity 1-2 slice oblique coronal sagittal image , suggest small full-thickness tear ; type V , presence major discontinuity two slice oblique coronal sagittal image , suggest medium large full-thickness tear . Postoperative incomplete heal re-tear define either Sugaya type IV V. MRI ultrasonography data analyze musculoskeletal radiologist 10 year experience blind study . The deltoid muscle , subacromial/subdeltoid bursa , long head biceps tendon , entire rotator cuff examine , special emphasis integrity subscapularis tendon , supraspinatus tendon , infraspinatus tendon , teres minor tendon . The tendon scan along long short ax . The radiologist define full-thickness tear incomplete heal re-tear , hypoechoic full-thickness cleft inside tendon , detachment tendon bone , insertion medial dislocation , non-visualization tendon . Surgical Procedure Postoperative Care The senior investigator conduct surgical procedure arthroscopically use three portal : anterior , lateral , posterior . In participant stiff shoulder , manipulation perform capsular release . Synovectomy , biceps procedure , debridement partially torn rotator cuff tendon perform glenohumeral joint . After glenohumeral procedure , subacromial decompression perform remove inflame bursal tissue , acromioplasty conduct motorize burr almost participant except extremely thin acromion yield flat acromion undersurface ensure adequate work space repair . Distal clavicle resection perform select participant . The anteroposterior retraction size tear measure calibrate probe , footprint preparation perform ring curette , rasp , shaver expose bleed bony surface . After anchor insert accord select repair technique , load suture pass tendon use flexible suture passer ( Expressew® , Depuy Mitek , Raynham , MA ) suture passer ( Spectrum® , Linvatec , Largo , FL ) . All suture secure use SMC knot . After subacromial procedure , operator always return glenohumeral joint irrigation identify medial anchor pull-out , miss foreign material , biceps incorporate rotator cuff repair . All participant follow rehabilitation protocol . They wear abduction brace 5 week start passive ROM brace removal . Participants limited motion preoperatively start tolerable control passive motion right pain subside postoperatively . Shrugging shoulder active motion elbow ( flexion , extension ) , forearm ( supination , pronation ) , wrist , hand encourage immediately surgery . After brace weaning , active assist ROM perform accord pre-established protocol 6 week . After full passive ROM obtain , muscle-strengthening exercise start ; sport activity permit 6 month surgery . All physical therapy protocol follow cooperation supervision rehabilitation physician . Statistical Analysis Statistical analysis perform use SPSS software ( version 18.0E ; SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL ) . Frequency descriptive statistic analyze determine baseline characteristic , t-test , chi-square test , analysis variance , Mann-Whitney test perform compare three group . Tukey 's post-hoc test Bonferroni 's test use determine group difference occur . Statistical significance set P < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule undergo arthroscopic acromioplasty rotator cuff repair partial full thickness tear Age < 80 year time diagnosis Patient willing able comply study prescription Patient able give write informed consent patient registration/randomisation Patients rotator cuff tear arthropathy Severe osteoarthritis ( SamilsonPrieto grade II high ) Rheumatoid arthritis Chronic renal failure ( i.e. , high risk use NSAIDs opioid drug ) Liver failure Myocardial infarction chronic heart failure Cerebral vascular disease Active gastric ulcer bleed Allergies NSAIDs opioid drug Previous surgery side Pregnant breast feeding patient Those willing participate trial
